name: mcp-hello-world
description: A minimalistic MCP server demonstrating tools, resources, and prompts

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:run
scripts.test:run: node --version | grep -q 'v2[3-9]\|v[3-9][0-9]' && node --test tests/**/*.test.ts || (npm run build:tests && node --test build/tests/**/*.test.js)
scripts.inspect: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node build/index.js
